issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I added a second autoscaling node to an existing setup. The new service endpoint shows as enabled however requests to it fail with "error (InternalFailure): Failed to lookup ENABLED service of type AutoScalingBackend." {code} Installed Packages Name : eucalyptus Arch : x86_64 Version : 4.0.0 Release : 0.0.633.20140220git1ca48e1b.el6 {code} Initially the cloud had all user services on host 53. Then I added compute (COM_60) and AutoScaling (AS_60). Targeting the added compute service returns OK but the AutoScaling node gives aforementioned error despite being enabled. {code} [17:25:59] [a-11 | 10.111.5.53 ]: euca-describe-services | grep AS SERVICE autoscaling autoscaling AS_53 ENABLED 25 http://10.111.5.53:8773/services/AutoScaling arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_53/ SERVICE autoscaling autoscaling AS_60 ENABLED 25 http://10.111.5.60:8773/services/AutoScaling arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_60/ [17:26:01] [a-11 | 10.111.5.53 ]: [17:26:10] [a-11 | 10.111.5.53 ]: [17:26:10] [a-11 | 10.111.5.53 ]: fields.summary: Failed to lookup ENABLED service of type AutoScalingBackend

comments.body: The same issue occurs for CloudWatch and ELB.

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.0
Release     : 0.0.714.20140314gitc937f594.el6

describe launch config specifying different as endpoints
{code}
[root@h-18 ~]# euscale-describe-launch-configs -U http://10.111.5.18:8773/services/AutoScaling
